Welcome to Tidal Gauge App's documentation!
===========================================
.. image:: IMG_007.png
   :width: 500pt

Tidal gauge app for monitoring S.Sebastiao station (SP -BRAZIL).
A python tool for all kinds of mobile.


Author :  Mabel Calim Costa

email  :  mabelcalim@gmail.com

code: python
